content.title: Run the App
content.body:
1. From the Live Preview Settings window, under Platforms and Channels, check the box next to the Responsive Web.
    Ensure that you have unselected the checkboxes for all the other platforms and channels.
  2. Click Save & Run.
    It may take some time for Iris to run the app.
    Once the build is complete, the sample app opens in the Iris Preview window.
